name: Run Experiment Run!
description:
You are a Robot who escaped their human overlord, run through the laboratory walls and escape, as the human built killer robots chase you down!!

A collab between Me (My LD Jam Profile) and  Insulin (Insulin's LD Jam Profile)

Ludum Dare 41 Entry - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/$82939
